mapper.select: SELECT B.G_KEY, B.NAME as goodsName, B.IMAGE_LIST FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY WHERE A.CTG_KEY = #{ctgKey} AND B.TYPE = 3 AND B.IS_SHOW = 1 AND B.IS_SELL = 1 ORDER BY B.G_KEY DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT B.G_KEY, B.NAME as goodsName, B.IMAGE_LIST, C.WRITER, TO_CHAR(C.PUBLISH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as publishDate, D.NAME, E.PRICE, E.SELL_PRICE, E.POINT, (SELECT PRICE_KEY FROM T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION T WHERE T.G_KEY = B.G_KEY) as priceKey FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY INNER JOIN T_BOOK C ON B.G_KEY = C.G_KEY LEFT JOIN T_CP D ON B.CP_KEY = D.CP_KEY LEFT JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION E ON B.G_KEY = E.G_KEY WHERE A.CTG_KEY = #{ctgKey} AND B.TYPE = 3 AND B.IS_SHOW = 1 AND B.IS_SELL = 1 ORDER BY B.G_KEY DESC OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(B.G_KEY) FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY WHERE A.CTG_KEY = #{ctgKey} AND B.TYPE = 3 AND B.IS_SHOW = 1 AND B.IS_SELL = 1 ORDER BY B.G_KEY DESC

SELECT B.G_KEY, B.NAME as goodsName, B.IMAGE_LIST, C.WRITER, TO_CHAR(C.PUBLISH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as publishDate, D.NAME, E.PRICE, E.SELL_PRICE, E.POINT, (SELECT PRICE_KEY FROM T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION T WHERE T.G_KEY = B.G_KEY) as priceKey FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY INNER JOIN T_BOOK C ON B.G_KEY = C.G_KEY LEFT JOIN T_CP D ON B.CP_KEY = D.CP_KEY LEFT JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION E ON B.G_KEY = E.G_KEY WHERE A.CTG_KEY IN (847, 848, 849, 850, 851) AND B.TYPE = 3 AND B.IS_SHOW = 1 AND B.IS_SELL = 1 ORDER BY B.G_KEY DESC

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT B.G_KEY, B.NAME as goodsName, B.IMAGE_LIST, C.WRITER, D.NAME, E.PRICE, E.SELL_PRICE, E.POINT, E.PRICE_KEY, C.SUBJECT_CTG_KEY, A.CTG_KEY, TO_CHAR(C.PUBLISH_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as publishDate FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY INNER JOIN T_BOOK C ON B.G_KEY = C.G_KEY LEFT JOIN T_CP D ON B.CP_KEY = D.CP_KEY LEFT JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION E ON B.G_KEY = E.G_KEY WHERE 1=1
AND A.CTG_KEY IN (701)
--AND A.CTG_KEY IN (701, 705, 714, 735, 746, 745, 3748, 3749, 4186, 4230, 4235, 4272, 6436, 4380, 4232) AND B.TYPE = 3 AND B.IS_SHOW = 1 AND B.IS_SELL = 1
AND REGEXP_LIKE(B.NAME, #{searchText})
UNION ALL
SELECT B.G_KEY, B.NAME as goodsName, B.IMAGE_LIST, C.WRITER, D.NAME, E.PRICE, E.SELL_PRICE, E.POINT, E.PRICE_KEY, C.SUBJECT_CTG_KEY, A.CTG_KEY, TO_CHAR(C.PUBLISH_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as publishDate FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY INNER JOIN T_BOOK C ON B.G_KEY = C.G_KEY LEFT JOIN T_CP D ON B.CP_KEY = D.CP_KEY LEFT JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION E ON B.G_KEY = E.G_KEY WHERE 1=1
AND A.CTG_KEY IN (701)
--AND A.CTG_KEY IN (701, 705, 714, 735, 746, 745, 3748, 3749, 4186, 4230, 4235, 4272, 6436, 4380, 4232) AND B.TYPE = 3 AND B.IS_SHOW = 1 AND B.IS_SELL = 1
AND REGEXP_LIKE(C.WRITER, #{searchText})
)T GROUP BY T.G_KEY, T.goodsName, T.IMAGE_LIST, T.WRITER, T.NAME, T.PRICE, T.SELL_PRICE, T.POINT, T.PRICE_KEY, T.SUBJECT_CTG_KEY, T.CTG_KEY, T.publishDate OFFSET #{startNumber} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{listLimit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT (TT.G_KEY) FROM ( SELECT T.G_KEY FROM ( SELECT B.G_KEY FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY INNER JOIN T_BOOK C ON B.G_KEY = C.G_KEY LEFT JOIN T_CP D ON B.CP_KEY = D.CP_KEY LEFT JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION E ON B.G_KEY = E.G_KEY WHERE 1=1
AND A.CTG_KEY IN (701)
AND B.TYPE = 3 AND B.IS_SHOW = 1 AND B.IS_SELL = 1
AND REGEXP_LIKE(B.NAME, #{searchText})
UNION ALL
SELECT B.G_KEY FROM T_CATEGORY_GOODS A INNER JOIN T_GOODS B ON A.G_KEY = B.G_KEY INNER JOIN T_BOOK C ON B.G_KEY = C.G_KEY LEFT JOIN T_CP D ON B.CP_KEY = D.CP_KEY LEFT JOIN T_GOODS_PRICE_OPTION E ON B.G_KEY = E.G_KEY WHERE 1=1
